Nathanael Johnson

Applied AI Graduate Student
GitHub
LinkedIn
Medium
Twitter
Email
Nathanael is a passionate Applied AI graduate student from Saba, Netherlands Antilles, currently pursuing his M.S. in Applied Artificial Intelligence at Lipscomb University. With a strong background in Data Science and a keen interest in AI applications across healthcare, finance, and data analytics, he enjoys working out, hiking, cinematography, drawing, video games, and board games in his free time.

Academic & Research Experience

Lipscomb University2023 - Present
M.S. Applied AI Student
  • Conducting research on bias and fairness in Large Language Models for mental health applications, contributing to advancing responsible AI deployment in healthcare.
  • Developing predictive models and machine learning systems across various domains including healthcare, finance, and transportation optimization.
Middle Tennessee State University2022 - 2023
M.S. Data Science Student
  • Completed advanced coursework in statistical methods, predictive modeling, and large-scale data analysis, building expertise in applied analytics.
  • Developed multiple data science projects including market analysis, customer segmentation, and business intelligence dashboards.

Education

Lipscomb UniversityM.S. - Applied Artificial Intelligence (Currently enrolled, expected July 2025)
Middle Tennessee State UniversityM.S. - Data Science
Lipscomb UniversityB.S. - Data Science (Graduated December 2022)

Technical skills

Python & Machine LearningProficient in Python for data science, machine learning, and AI applications including predictive modeling, data analysis, and neural networks.
Python
TensorFlow
Scikit-learn
Data Science & AnalyticsExperienced in statistical analysis, data visualization, and building predictive models for business insights and decision-making.
Tableau
SQL
R
Web DevelopmentBuilding responsive web applications and dashboards using modern frameworks and technologies.
JavaScript
React
HTML/CSS
